I’m Mika, a frontend engineer on Karrot’s Data team.At Karrot, massive amounts of user events are collected every day. These events are essential for designing experiments, improving our products, and making data-driven decisions. But as the logs scaled, managing them effectively became increasingly important.That’s why we restructured our company-wide logging convention and built a platform called Event
